# BatchTrack

BatchTrack is production and inventory software for small-batch makers.

Primary site: https://www.batchtrack.com/
Sitemap: https://www.batchtrack.com/sitemap.xml

Public docs and pages:
- https://www.batchtrack.com/pricing
- https://www.batchtrack.com/help/how-it-works
- https://www.batchtrack.com/help/system-faq
- https://www.batchtrack.com/legal/privacy
- https://www.batchtrack.com/legal/terms
- https://www.batchtrack.com/legal/cookies
